subject: Western Renewable Power Development Summit  May 7-9  San Francisco
body:
Renewable Power Project Finance: The Tutorial








 


Western Renewable Power Development Summit
    May 7-9, 2007 * Hyatt Regency Hotel   * San Francisco, CA

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD BROCHURE

The Western Renewable Power Development Summit will bring together regulators, utility renewable energy policy and planning executives, developers and financiers to give their views on the fast-paced renewable industry in the West. Join the key players in Renewable Energy as they discuss the changing development landscape. Hear utility executives, leading developers and financiers discuss:

The challenges and opportunities presented by changing Renewable Portfolio Standards (RPS)
The effects and implications of the California Global Warming Solutions Act of 2006
How to attract investors and get your renewables project financed in the current market

Solving transmission interconnection problems for renewable
projects






Don't miss the pre-conference workshop, presented by Evolution Markets, Inc:
RECs, Carbon and Renewable Electricity Project Finance
